maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Guard
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Garde

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Oh, a \v[lore.title.seeker] wants to talk to me?\. I am sorry but I don't think we got any business right now.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Oh, un \v[lore.title.seeker] veut me parler ?\. Je suis désolé, mais je ne crois pas que nous ayons quelque chose à se dire.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Aww, don't give me that face.\. I'm sure we can talk later!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ahh, me fait pas cette tête.\. Je suis sûr que l'on pourra discuter plus tard !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Hey there, lady.\. Anything I can help you with?
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Hé, jeune dame.\. Est-ce que je peux vous aider ?

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Kney'tehab sent you to me to test our new toy?\. That's amazing news!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Kney'tehab t'as envoyé vers moi pour tester notre nouveau jouet ?\. C'est une excellente nouvelle !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Even finding a \v[lore.title.seeker] to help me.\. The boss can be such a sweetheart when he wants to!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Il a même trouvé un \v[lore.title.seeker] pour m'aider.\. Le patron peut vraiment être gentil quand il le veut !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: See, we have found a way to implement a human device into locations flowing with Ancient energy.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Tu vois, on a trouvé un moyen pour installer un appareil humain dans une zone emplie d'énergie des Anciens.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Here we wired a distillery into a puzzle to brew ourselves some drinks in the way of the Ancients!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ici nous avons branché une distillerie dans un puzzle pour brasser quelques boissons à la manière des Anciens !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: I know, right?!\. Drinks flowing with Ancient power must be the stuff!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ouais, hein ?!\. Des boissons remplie de la puissance des Anciens, ça ne peut être que bon !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: I'm so excited I'd love to start right away!\. But we need a few materials first to get our baby running.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Je suis tellement excitée que j'adorerai commencer dès maintenant !\. Mais nous avons besoin de quelques matériaux pour démarrer ce bébé.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Here, take a list of the things.\. It's mostly ingredients from different places and some ice for the cooling.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Tiens, prend cette liste.\. C'est surtout des ingrédients venant de coins différents et un peu de glace pour le refroidissement.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Great!\. It will be worth it, I promise you!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Super !\. Ça va valoir le coup, je te le promets !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Gather all the ingredients that we need for a test run.\. Oh, and some ice for the cooling!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Récupère tous les ingrédients dont on a besoin pour faire un test.\. Oh, et n'oublie pas la glace pour le refroidissement !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Heya \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. You got everything?
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Tu as tout ?

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Amazing, you really got everything!\. Now we can begin with the fun part.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Super, tu as vraiment tout amené !\. Maintenant on peut commencer la partie marrante.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Let me just prepare everything you need!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Laisse-moi juste rapidement tout préparer !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Alrighty, that's it.\. Here, take this and go down the stairs behind me to your right.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Voilà, c'est bon.\. Tiens, prend ça et descends les escaliers derrière moi à ta droite.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: I will follow you and tell you how to get our precious machine running!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Je vais te suivre et t'expliquer comment faire tourner notre merveilleuse machine !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Go down the stairs behind me to your right.\. I will follow you and explain how it works!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Descends les escaliers derrière moi à ta droite.\. Je vais te suivre et t'expliquer comment tout fonctionne !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Sorry, but I'm busy here.\. I'm sure you'll manage on your own.\. Don't forget that the console has an instruction!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Désolé, mais je suis occupé là.\. Je suis sûre que tu t'en sortiras tout seul.\. N'oublie pas que la console possède un guide d'utilisation !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Amazing job down there, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I already told the boss so he can prepare your reward!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: C'est du bon travail que tu as fait là-dessous, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. J'ai déjà informé le patron, pour qu'il puisse te donner ta récompense !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: \c[3]Come back afterwards\c[0] if you wanna brew more of the finest!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: \c[3]Reviens me voir après\c[0], si tu veux brasser plus de bons trucs !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker], great to see you back!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker], c'est sympa de te revoir !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: We already tweaked our sweet little machine with the data of your tests.\. The stuff it produces is just the best!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: On a déjà fait des réglages sur la machine avec les données de tes tests.\. Ce qui en sort, c'est juste le top !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: We can open it up for you to use it on your own again, if you agree to give it some further tests!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: On peut encore l'ouvrir pour que tu puisses t'en servir comme tu en as envie, si tu veux faire plus de tests !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Great!\. You will see that we have changed the way it works a bit.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Super !\. Tu verras que l'on a changé un peu la manière dont il fonctionne.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: You will now have a \c[3]limited amount of time\c[0] to refine those ingredients as much as possible!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Tu auras maintenant un \c[3]temps limité\c[0] pour traiter les ingrédients autant que tu peux !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Basically, to help us out you should just try to reach as much \c[3]quality\c[0] as you can.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: En résumé, pour nous aider, tu devrais juste essayer d'atteindre la meilleure \c[3]qualité\c[0] que tu peux.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: That'll also \c[3]increase the number of drinks\c[0] produced, so it's win-win for everyone!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Cela va aussi \c[3]augmenter le nombre de boissons\c[0] produites, donc c'est gagnant pour nous deux !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Thing is, reaching high qualities is tricky, because it's about maintaining a \c[3]high heat\c[0] without making mistakes.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Le truc, c'est que atteindre une haute qualité est difficile, parce qu'il faut maintenir une \c[3]chaleur élevée\c[0] sans faire d'erreurs.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Well, I'm sure you will get the hang of it.\. I will give you another batch of ingredients to start right away.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Tu devrais rapidement t'y habituer.\. Je vais te donner un autre ensemble d'ingrédients pour que tu puisses commencer.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: You can get more from my assistant down there, if you also bring the base materials.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Tu peux en avoir plus en demandant à mon assistante, si tu as les matériaux de base.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Good luck!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Bonne chance !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Bye!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Bye !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: What, seriously?\. But why wouldn't you?\. There's no pressure, really...
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Quoi, sérieusement ?\. Pourquoi pas ?\. Il n'y a pas de pression, vraiment...

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Try to get as much \c[3]quality\c[0] out of it as possible!\. Our data says that \c[3]maintaining high heat is key\c[0].
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Essaye d'atteindre la meilleure \c[3]qualité\c[0] que tu peux !\. Nos données indiquent que pour ça, il faut \c[3]maintenir une chaleur élevée\c[0].

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: My assistant Bru down there can prepare more brewing sets if needed.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Mon assistante Bru en bas peut préparer plus de kits de brassage si tu as besoin.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Wow, \v[lore.title.seeker], Those quality-ratings were just off the charts!\. Amazing work!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Waouh, \v[lore.title.seeker], Ces niveaux de qualités sont juste de la folie !\. Un travail formidable !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: That'll really help us refine the mechanics.
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Cela va vraiment nous aider pour plus tard.

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Also, we worked on another recipe for you to use.\. You should try it out when you have the time!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Sinon, on a travaillé sur une autre recette, pour que tu puisses t'en servir.\. Tu devrais l'essayer si tu as le temps !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Anyway, things are getting busy again.\. See you around, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: En tout cas, les choses continuent.\. À plus tard, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Bye!
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Bye !

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Ryda
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Ryda

maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.orig: Heya, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Wanna get more drinks done?
maps/heat-village/interior/tradebuilding.text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Tu veux brasser quelques boissons ?
